channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: House passes bill blocking future presidents from banning oil drilling without Congress' approval
item.description: The House passed a GOP-led bill on Friday to prevent presidents from placing bans on fracking before receiving congressional approval.

item.title: Cynthia Lummis Slams USAID Funding For ‘Sesame Street’ Program In Iraq
item.description: Lummis outlined a series of items given funding from USAID as 'some of the ways the last administration has wasted your money.'

item.title: Chris Swanson, prominent sheriff and Democrat, announces run for Michigan governor
item.description: Chris Swanson, the high-profile sheriff of Michigan's Genesee County, is launching a Democratic bid to become the battleground state's next governor.

item.title: For a Permanent Victory Against DEI, President Trump Needs Congress

item.title: The Political Exoticism of I’m Still Here
item.description: Walter Salles reflects our parallel contradictions.

item.title: Personalized vaccine offers hope for patients with late-stage kidney cancer, clinical trial shows
item.description: Researchers, in a sense, manipulated each patient’s cancer in an attempt to prevent it from coming back.

item.title: H-1B visa debates roil U.S.-India relations ahead of Trump-Modi meeting. Here’s what needs to change—on both sides
item.description: Can "Made in the USA" and "Make in India" coexist? Protectionist policies from each side are hindering progress.

item.title: McConnell, Warner push bill to preserve whiskey and wildlife

item.title: For Investment Leaders: Why You Should Learn to Love Losing
item.description: Sébastien Page, CFA, shares the story of a grueling handball match that reshaped a competitor’s mindset and reveals how investment leaders can apply t...

item.title: Two Cheers for Tariffs
item.description: Not every tariff is a boon, nor is every one a bane. But they can provide long-term gains well in excess of their short-term costs.

item.title: Stablecoin donation company Coala Pay closes $3.5 million funding round
item.description: Coala Pay connects donors with local aid organizations using smart contracts and stablecoins.

item.title: Harris dodges questions about political future, possible run for California governor

item.title: The Week: Musk’s DOGE Takes On Washington
item.description: Plus: Donald Trump considers a real-estate opportunity in Gaza.

item.title: Attention Must Be Paid: The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act Is Set to Expire
item.description: Expiring provisions promise tax hikes if not extended.

item.title: Congress eyes legislation to end pandemic-era eviction rules
item.description: Legislation now in the House hopper would end a pandemic-era federal regulation that required landlords to provide tenants with 30 days' notice before...

item.title: Judges Issuing Lawless Bans On Trump’s Clearly Legal Executive Actions Have Extremist Records

item.title: Fentanyl's financial grip on US skyrocketed to $2.7T at height of Biden admin: study

item.title: Top Republican moves to restrict AI exports amid concerns over Chinese tech
item.description: House Homeland Security Committee Chairman Mark Green is leading a new bill to further restrict China from getting its hands on sensitive U.S. technol...

item.title: Worlds And Records Collide In Super Bowl LIX
item.description: To emerge as Super Bowl champs, Saquon Barkley and the Eagles will have to overcome a familiar face on the opposing sideline: Andy Reid.

item.title: Senior public-health officials are reportedly being asked to rank thousands of employees on how vital they are to agency functions
item.description: The White House is preparing an executive order to slash thousands of workers from the HHS and CDC, according to anonymous employees.

item.title: Beyond the Hype: Do Hedge Funds Deliver Value?
item.description: Skill and alpha are scarce and difficult to obtain in the hedge fund market.

item.description: Real assets' first test in modern times started in 2021. Did they perform as hoped?

item.title: Book Review: The Making of Modern Corporate Finance
item.description: Donald Chew delivers a love letter to unfettered capitalism and the financial system that oils the gears of commerce.

item.title: What’s the Winning Ingredient in M&A? The Answer Lies in Due Diligence
item.description: The days of due diligence as a box-checking exercise are over.

item.title: Congressman sponsoring DeepSeek ban says China has ‘tried many, many’ times to infiltrate the U.S. via software. ‘We’re right to be vigilant’
item.description: A bipartisan initiative wants to ban DeepSeek on government devices over national security concerns.

item.title: All The New Orleans Gems Trump Will Miss Out On During His Quick Super Bowl Visit
item.description: Viewing New Orleans only through the spectrum of debauchery does a disservice to one of the most unique blends of culture in the world.
